title: I'll say this as swift as possible.
body:
Can udyr get a blood moon skin already? Ever since blood moons were mentioned, I always thought he'd get one since "Once a generation, a child is born under a blood red moon, a child said to live between the two worlds of spirit and man. This child is brought to the Spirit Walker to continue the shamanic line. Udyr was such a child, and knew the howl of the tundra wolves even before he learned the language of his ancestors."

Rito plz :c

replies.body: Why not an udyr rework? Right now he is basically a glorified minion.

I think just slowly giving buffs would do him fine tbh, he isn't such a mess where he lacks identifyable power IMO.

If they really wanted to, they could do more with his passive, like make it magicka-like where if you mix certain cast together you get an additional effect. This alone could raise his skill ceiling and potential heavily.

Actually uou just gave me an idea, thanks. I'll see about getting more attention to it.

He NEEDS a rework. 

He looks like a hobo wearing animal furs and trash bags. His gameplay is LITERALLY nothing but stat buffs and a better sunfire cape. He is the definition of a ball of stats.

He often abuses items which cause him to get nerfed. And he doesn't live up to his theme of channeling the power of primal power.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KWZRj7P0,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-07T06:00:30.129+0000)
>
> He often abuses items which cause him to get nerfed. And he doesn't live up to his theme of channeling the power of primal power.

No, he doesn't, because he's channeling his opponent's rage instead, as a measure of trying to control his own I suppose. "You're not angry if there are others who're madder than you".
If I think of a monk channeling the spiritual power of a Bear, I don't think of him just hitting you harder and running faster. Similarly, I don't associate turtles with life steal.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KWZRj7P0,comment-id=00000001000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-07T19:37:05.187+0000)
>
> If I think of a monk channeling the spiritual power of a Bear, I don't think of him just hitting you harder and running faster. Similarly, I don't associate turtles with life steal.

Bears do run pretty fast when on chase, since they will be on all fours and have enough muscles for the job most of the time; and the "stunning" aspect of the bear stance makes total sense, considering the infamous bear slaps, I think giving you stuns is already pretty modest.

The turtle stance does give a shield, makes sense. As for the life-steal, it's now changed for the Xin's W passive model where he kinda just heals himself periodically after every few strikes for some reason, which can make sense given that turtles are often associated with living long lives.

So yeah on these 2 examples/cases alone, I don't think Udyr's theme and in-game execution is off tbh.

His bear stance DOES reflect what a bear does. His bear stance DOES NOT feel like what a monk of spiritual power channeling the power of a bear does. 

And his life steal does not make sense. Turtles should live longer via creating extra health maybe, or increased health regeneration, NOT through stealing their longevity via attacking others.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KWZRj7P0,comment-id=0000000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-07T20:18:53.314+0000)
>
> His bear stance DOES reflect what a bear does. His bear stance DOES NOT feel like what a monk of spiritual power channeling the power of a bear does. 

What do you mean, bear does give chase and hunt themselves (not too much of a predator most of the time, but they do hunt). And they claw people with slaps so strong most things die from 1 hit if direct-impact. It makes perfect sense that Bear Stance makes him run fast for a short period and stun people on-hit.
 
> And his life steal does not make sense. Turtles should live longer via creating extra health maybe, or increased health regeneration, NOT through stealing their longevity via attacking others.

As I was saying, it no longer leeches HP (or in this case, "life"). It's now like Xin, they just heal themselves passively with striking as a trigger for un-explained reasons and mechanisms, it's "healing", not "life-stealing" (the heal amount also scales with his own HP and not damage dealt). Which can make sense, you can just say that Udyr triggers the healing in battle to stay alive.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KWZRj7P0,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-07T06:00:30.129+0000)
>
> He looks like a hobo wearing animal furs and trash bags.

Wait he's notsupposed to be that? Kappa
A glorified minion that can clear all four jungles like an olympic runner and then proceed to gore my immobile carries.

Udyr's four stances need to be distinctly different colours for the sake of gameplay clarity. The Blood Moon skin line trends towards red and white. Three out of four of Blood Moon Udyr's stances would look completely out of place.

Elementalist Udyr on the other hand...

While true, there is red and white, we will say tiger is red, phoenix is red.
BM Diana has a decent amount of purplish colors for bear to use.
And since it seems that it is a demons HARVEST moon, gold could slide over turtle(i know not bloody enough but is his defense /shrug)


######i had to retype decent like 4 times ><

If I see a golden Udyr running towards me, I'm going to assume he's in Tiger Stance, not Turtle stance. Gameplay clarity is compromised.

All the blood moon skins are predominantly red. Only one of Udyr's stances can be predominantly red. So the problem stands that a Blood Moon Udyr skin would only look like a Blood Moon skin in one stance out of four.

That's not to say Udyr can't have a mysterious demon skin. I've just had an idea of an Udyr skin representing depictions of demons in Runeterra's different cultures, crossing over from various skinlines.
Tiger: Arclight yellow.
Turtle: Soulstealer green.
Bear: Marauder blue
Phoenix: Blood Moon red.
Fair enough was just spit balling. But a Demon King Udyr would be badass. And i was thinking of a difference from his SG skin. Also Frozen blue bear imo
We should push this idea!  It could make for a great 1820 skin!!!
Smae
Ah I see the issues of it then.
It would be sick, but it is better for them to wait until after he gets updated. If I remember correctly he is on the VGU list.

Blood Moon Udyr would be cool, but lack sense. By this, I mean that the way his stances work would have to reflect something demonic rather than natural. 

You also run into the issue of colors. Blood moon is very red, grey and black, and Udyr is Blue, Green, Orange and... Orange. For clarity's sake, something about Udyr would have to change to make way for this.
Udyr's model looks totally crap lol, it needs update badly, right now he is only playable on his ultimate skin
